**From 18 to 21 December 2025 — Leuphana University**

**Room C.40.606, Seminarraum, [Main Building at Leuphana University](https://www.leuphana.de/en/university/maps.html)**

---

This workshop explores the emerging field of **computational provenance research**, bringing together scholars, curators, and data scientists to discuss digital approaches to provenance, data modeling, and computational analysis.


### What You Need

- **You need to bring your own laptop**
- A **Google account**, as we’ll be using **Google Colab** for hands-on sessions.  
- If you prefer, you may use your own local environment (e.g., **Visual Studio Code** or **Jupyter Notebooks**).  
- We will be coding in **Python** throughout the workshop.



### Modules

- OCR  
- Data Models
- Python Language  
- From Text to Data
- Data Analysis  
- Data Visualization  
- Resources
